definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to maintain the law as firm as a mountain (idiom); to enforce the law strictly
City Urban Administrative and Law Enforcement Bureau (PRC)
pinyin: Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2

sentences.english: The team for inspection of law enforcement shall not directly handle problems.
sentences.chinese: 执法检查组不直接处理问题。

sentences.english: "Both are high-priority targets" for the agency's enforcement division, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，他们两都是SEC执法部门高优先级的目标。

sentences.english: The Anti-monopoly Authority shall maintain the confidentiality of the person making such report.
sentences.chinese: 反垄断执法机构应当为举报人保密。

sentences.english: Deep-seated reason lies in utilitarian assessing by the law enforcement agencies.
sentences.chinese: 深层原因是对执法机关功利性的考核造成的。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Certificates are exclusively issued by the National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC).
sentences.chinese: 第三条执法证由国家发展和改革委员会统一颁发。

sentences.english: It's nerve-wracking to watch the games that law enforcement and drug dealers play with each other.
sentences.chinese: 看执法部门和毒贩之间的猫鼠游戏让人心惊胆战。
人民警察必须做到公正执法。

sentences.english: Impartially enforcing the law and effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 秉公执法，切实维护纳税人的合法权益。

sentences.english: We will implement the administrative law enforcement accountability system to strengthen and improve administrative law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 加强和改善行政执法，落实行政执法责任制。

sentences.english: We will implement the administrative law enforcement accountability system to strengthen and improve administrative law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 加强和改善行政执法，落实行政执法责任制。

sentences.english: The law enforcement officer searched a proptosis there and then illegal line operation of movement of goods document.
sentences.chinese: 执法人员当场搜出了非法生产经营以来的运货单据。

sentences.english: The law-enforcement level of the court and procuratorate has been raised remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 法院和检察院的执法水平又有明显提高。

sentences.english: China enhances law enforcement activities in relevant waters.
sentences.chinese: 中国派遣海监船加强在相关海域执法活动。

sentences.english: For serious cases, will be handed over to the public security organs.
sentences.chinese: 对于情节严重者，会将线索移交给公安执法机关。

sentences.english: Her father was a wily old attorney.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲是一个狡猾的老执法官。

sentences.english: Fourth, sound defense and an investigation mechanism, enhance law enforcement efforts.
sentences.chinese: 四是健全联防协查机制，增强执法合力。

definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
to promote knowledge of laws/rights awareness
